artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: caricature of a man with wild hair and elongated nose, sticking out his tongue, with arms out and pockets inside out, with playing cards falling around him

provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: El Jugador (Gambler), plate 19 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
